1.Title: Chapter One
1.Subtitle: An Introduction (In Parts)
1.Synopsis: A split prologue between Cody and Katiya.

2.Title: Chapter Two
2.Subtitle: Robot Boy
2.Synopsis: A male office worker languishes in his listless life.
2.Summary: > Cody introduces his life after college.> Cody takes heat from his coworkers.> Cody and Kei talk before the weekend.

3.Title: Chapter Three
3.Subtitle: Tiger Girl
3.Synopsis: A female knight trembles at the edge of eternal war.
3.Summary: > Katiya introduces how stressful her life is.> Katiya celebrates the next step of training.> Chief Aldrin introduces their probational exams.> Jullian ushers Katiya back to her place.

4.Title: Chapter Four
4.Subtitle: Firsthand Home
4.Synopsis: Cody returns to his new place in his hometown.
4.Summary: > Cody drives home on a nostalgic road.> An old friend calls. Cody feels behind.> Cody unpacks with his parents. Miguel enters.

5.Title: Chapter Five
5.Subtitle: Secondhand Cottage
5.Synopsis: Katiya rushes to begin her first day.
5.Summary: > Katiya has nightmares of a devastating past.> Katiya explores her new Guard-sactioned home.> Katiya struggles to start her day.> Walk from home to the Royal Base.

6.Title: Chapter Six
6.Subtitle: A Past Outgrown
6.Synopsis: Cody tries not to feel left behind.
6.Summary: > Cody and Miguel have a sleepover.> The two drunken friends talk about life.

7.Title: Chapter Seven
7.Subtitle: A Future Foretold
7.Synopsis: Katiya tries not to panic at what feels inevitable.
7.Summary: > A slow first day ends in panic.> They respond to the events of Firebrand.> Katiya's anxiety cracks her tough facade.

8.Title: Chapter Eight
8.Subtitle: Strangers To Enemies
8.Synopsis: An otherwoldly threshold brings two strangers together.
8.Summary: > Drunken Cody crosses the threshold.> Cody encounters Katiya for the first time.

9.Title: Chapter Nine
9.Subtitle: Enemies To Combatants
9.Synopsis: Differences lead to misunderstandings and violence.
9.Summary: > Cody witnesses the fantasy world.> Katiya witnesses the contemporary world.> Cody prepares to fight Katiya.> Katiya fights Cody, part one.

10.Title: Chapter Ten
10.Subtitle: Strategic Retreat
10.Synopsis: Katiya struggles to shut out the intruder.
10.Summary: > Katiya finishes the fight and the two separate.> Katiya calms her panic, and finds Cody's iPod.> Katiya uncomfortably goes to work with Jullian and others. Refuses scouting.

11.Title: Chapter Eleven
11.Subtitle: Surprise Approach
11.Synopsis: Changes at work put Cody on the edge.
11.Summary: > Cody finishes the weekend then heads to work to receive news of layoffs.> Reed Broderick is hired despite weakening job security.

12.Title: Chapter Twelve
12.Subtitle: Anxiety and Avoidance
12.Synopsis: Katiya tries to resist her paralyzing panic.
12.Summary: FOUR WEEK TIME SKIP> Katiya continues taking domestic quests.The town hosts a wealthy family, but Chymaerans attack.> Katiya tries to respond but freezes in fear, half-solving the problem. She races to Bertram.

13.Title: Chapter Thirteen
13.Subtitle: Ennui and Excoriation
13.Synopsis: Cody tries to evade his deepening depression.
13.Summary: > Nav introduces project. Reed overpraised.> Cody struggles with change and ennui though Kei asks him out.> Cody goes cold. But Katiya bangs on the door.

14.Title: Chapter Fourteen
14.Subtitle: Knocking At The Door
14.Synopsis: Chaos drives Katiya to the threshold.
14.Summary: > Katiya barely saves Bertram.> Everyone laments Katiyathough Aldrin tries to defend her. Alone, she can only reach out to Cody.

16.Title: Chapter Sixteen
16.Subtitle: Luddite By Chance
16.Synopsis: Cody gives Katiya a lazy day in Hearthland Ridge.

17.Title: Chapter Seventeen
17.Subtitle: Technophile By Choice
17.Synopsis: Katiya gives Cody an active day in Gaffesend.

18.Title: Chapter Eighteen
18.Subtitle: Back To Business
18.Synopsis: Cody returns to work to start his design.

21.Synopsis: Cody tries Gaffesend's civilian self-defense class.
